issue.title: [Java] Refactor method name and param type in BaseIntVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5812](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5812). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Change to void _setWithPossibleTruncate(int index, long value);_ for better generality.
